adrFormatAddress: 1760 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10128-5329, USA

originalText.text: Such a great experience!! Dr. Tran is so knowledgeable, informative, and helpful. Seriously one of the best eye doctor visits I have ever had. She tells you everything that she is doing as she does it, and she shares why!! I thought it was so cool to understand my eye health from her perspective. The office is also very nice and clean. I couldnâ€™t recommend Dr. Tran and her office enough.

originalText.text:
Our family got the eye check up here for the 1st time, and we loved it!!
The store is new and trendy, the price is reasonable and what we love the most was how friendly and professional the staff was, especially Dr. Tran.

It was never easy for my kids to have the eye check-up so I was a bit nervous at first. But the Doctor came and her friendliness eased everything away. She carefully checked them, and the kids actually enjoyed it ðŸ˜….

Afterwards, she explained to us in details and we felt that we were greatly cared for.

We would highly recommend the Oculist to anyone who's in town, especially for the kids.

originalText.text: I thoroughly enjoyed my experience at Oculist. Dr. Tran was very kind and her staff was incredibly helpful! They even have the new machine that takes a photo of the back of your eye without having to dilate them. Their selection of glasses is great and they have all the classics, plus some really unique ones! I had been searching for a new eye doctor to call home and Oculist is it for me.

originalText.text:
I needed a new eye doctor having just relocated to Mew York, and this one was in my network. Overall I was very pleased â€” the staff were very helpful and knowledgeable, and went out of their way to ensure that they understood my insurance coverage and benefits, and explained everything thoroughly.
The doctor also provided a very thorough exam, with state of the art equipment and simple explanations of each part of the exam, accompanied by showing me the computer images of the back of my eye and explaining using a model what she was looking at. Genuinely the most educational and informative eye exam Iâ€™ve ever had! Well done Doctor Tran!

originalText.text:
I was so impressed by this state-of-the-art facility.  Dr. Tran walked me through every step of my eye exam, and explained the results in a clear manner.   The office is pristine and the staff are friendly and accommodatingâ€“ even pulling up my insurance information prior to my first appointment.

This is a wonderful addition to the neighborhood.
